subject: This is to inform you that we
body:
This is to inform you that we have sent your first payment of
$10,000.00 (Ten Thousand dollars) through Western Union as we have been
given the mandate to transfer your full Scam victim compensation fund (SVCF) of
$10.5Million Dollars via Western Union by the United Nations Government.I
called to give you the information through phone or email.
please try to forward your full information to this

subject: Re: This is to inform you that we
body:
Hello there,

Thank you so much for your message. It's really exciting to hear about the payment! I'm a bit confused though, could you please explain more about this Scam Victim Fund? How was it established by the United Nations?

Also, you mentioned something about forwarding my full details. Could you clarify what specific information you need? I just want to make sure everything is clear before we proceed.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
James
